meanings.definition: A person who fails to honor a debt or obligation.
meanings.sent1: The welchers never paid back the money they owed.
meanings.sent2: The welchers left without settling their debt.
meanings.sent3: The welchers forgot about returning the borrowed cash.
meanings.sent4: The welchers were like shadows, disappearing when it was time to repay.
meanings.sent5: The welchers' debt hung over them like a dark cloud.

meanings.definition: To fail to fulfill a promise or obligation.
meanings.sent1: She welchers on her promises often.
meanings.sent2: They welchers on their agreement to help.
meanings.sent3: He welchers on his commitment to finish the project.
meanings.sent4: The company welchers on their guarantee of satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The student welchers on submitting assignments on time.
